experience.aboutWork:
â€¢ Developed a Full Stack exercise tracker application with React for the front-end UI and Node/Express for the back-end REST API, utilizing AWS DynamoDB for data storage. 
â€¢ Minimized manual reporting effort by ~12 hours/week and enabled direct access to critical athletics data that helped in boosting their performance by 10%. 
â€¢ Evaluated architectural strategies of the application with particular emphasis on Scalability, Usability, and Security.
â€¢ Designed visual UI elements that provided real-time feedback for the users with an SUS Usability score of 81.30. 
â€¢ Instructed Software Engineering course that emphasizes on a real-world software development in Agile Scrum to design and evaluate the software systems effectively in a team environment.

â€¢ Developed modern web application using technologies such as Java Script, React, NodeJS, ExpressJS & AWS DynamoDB. 
â€¢ Reprogrammed and refactored the company's sales system from jQuery to Vue.js with Scrum development. Resulted in lower maintenance costs of 80% and faster program loading speed of 50%.
â€¢ Assisted developers in managing over 50 servers and reduced crashes from clients. Resulted in a 30% decrease in customer complaint rate. 
â€¢ Optimized management of company's AWS cloud service and utilized AWS RDS service to improve international data retrieval speed by 10%. 
â€¢ Accomplished requirements to be recognized as XVigil Professional, a SaaS based digital risk monitoring platform.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science

projects.name: An iOS Native Mobile Application, SwiftUI - Itinerary Guide
projects.details:
â€¢ Developed a comprehensive travel planning iOS application using Swift, AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB in a serverless architecture, resulting in a highly scalable and cost-effective solution. 
â€¢ Created an intuitive and user-friendly interface with Apple's SwiftUI following the MVVM architecture pattern, resulting in a seamless and efficient user experience. 
â€¢ Successfully integrated OAuth 2.0 and RESTful APIs to facilitate user account management, itinerary planning, and budget tracking, resulting in a more personalized and efficient travel planning process. 
â€¢ Collaborated with cross-functional teams in Software Innovation Lab, including UX designers and QA engineers, to ensure high- quality product delivery, timely bug fixes, and continuous improvement.

projects.name: Full Stack Application - LEA & Judiciary Interactive Case Management System
projects.details:
â€¢ Designed an interactive web application to allow authorized users to log in, file cases, host meetings efficiently using React, Express.js & AWS DynamoDB. 
â€¢ Conceptualized, designed, and developed a video conferencing platform using WebRTC and OpenTok API, which improved content accuracy by 30% and reduced manual errors.
â€¢ Utilized agile methodologies to deliver incremental improvements, leading to a 25% increase in overall productivity.
